name: Three Letters
description:
Three Letters is a simple word game where you write words that contain your 3 letters!
More letters in your word = more points! 
Score as many points as you can in 60 seconds!

3 Unique Game Modes:
Classic - Get as many points as you can in 60 seconds
Time Trial - Each answer will give you new letters and 2 extra seconds
Challenge - Challenge yourself to 80 brain stimulating puzzles

Art by Ethan Demarest - www.ethandemarest.com
